entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is described as getting to his feet quickly after being dismissed by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who dismisses Harry and has a conversation with Phineas Nigellus. He is referred to as 'sir' by Harry.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is a person who has a conversation with Dumbledore in the study. He expresses his inability to understand why Harry can do something better than Dumbledore.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is an animal that gives a low, musical cry when Dumbledore replies to Phineas Nigellus.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Phineas Nigellus have a conversation in the study, where they discuss Harry's abilities.
